meta.label: To Tableau server
meta.description: This exporter uploads data to a Tableau server with the Hyper format. Beware, exporting a large dataset to Tableau server may take long. If your dataset contains several millions records, you may want for instance to have DSS write into a SQL database usable by Tableau.

params.name: ssl_cert_path
params.label: SSL certificate
params.description: (optional) Full path to your tableau SSL certificate

params.name: project
params.label: Project
params.description: Upload the Hyper file to this project.
